features.name: Authentication System
features.description: Complete authentication system with email/password login, signup, Google OAuth, password reset, and session management

features.name: Admin Panel
features.description: Complete admin interface for managing categories, subcategories, tests, and questions with CRUD operations

features.name: Test-Taking Interface
features.description: Full-featured test interface with timer, question navigation, multiple question types (MCQ, True-False, Fill-in-blanks), auto-save, and auto-submit

features.name: Test Results & Analytics
features.description: Comprehensive results page with score breakdown, solution review, subcategory-wise performance, and comparison metrics

features.name: Student Dashboard
features.description: Analytics dashboard with performance charts, weak areas identification, AI-powered recommendations, and performance trends

features.name: Leaderboard System
features.description: Global, weekly, monthly, and test-specific leaderboards with ranking, badges, and progress tracking

features.name: Adaptive Practice System
features.description: AI-powered adaptive practice mode with difficulty adjustment, mastery tracking, and personalized question selection

features.name: User Profile Management
features.description: User profile editing, settings management, and preferences

features.name: Landing Page
features.description: SEO-optimized landing page with hero section, features, testimonials, and platform statistics

features.name: API Routes
features.description: Server-side API routes for test operations, practice sessions, and adaptive algorithm

features.name: UI Components Library
features.description: Comprehensive shadcn/ui component library including buttons, forms, dialogs, cards, badges, and more

features.name: Shared Components
features.description: Reusable components including loading skeletons, error boundaries, breadcrumbs, and display components

features.name: State Management
features.description: Zustand stores for authentication, test state, practice state, and UI state management

features.name: Database Types
features.description: TypeScript type definitions for database schema, adaptive algorithm, and common types

features.name: SEO & Metadata
features.description: SEO optimization with metadata API, structured data, sitemap generation, and robots.txt

features.name: Utility Functions
features.description: Helper functions and utilities for common operations

features.name: Styling & Theme
features.description: Global styles, CSS variables, color palette, and theme configuration with dark mode support
